001package game;
002import java.util.List;
003import java.util.HashMap;
004/**
005 * Room class - a room in an adventure game.
006 * @author Christophe TARATIBU
007 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026)
008 */
009public class Room
010{
011    /** Description of the room */
012    private final String aDescription;
013    /** Possible exists of the room */
014    private final HashMap<String, Room> aExits; 
015    /** Trap doors */
016    private final HashMap<String, Room> aTrapDoors; 
017    /** Name of the images (used to show rooms) */
018    private final String aImageName;
019    /** List of present items in the room */
020    private ItemList aRoomListItems;
021    /** Name of the room */
022    private final String aRoomName;
023
024    /**
025     * Initialization of a room
026     * @param pDescription Room's description
027     * @param pImageName An image used to show the room
028     * @param pRoomName The name of the room
029     */
030    public Room(final String pDescription, final String pImageName, final String pRoomName){
031        this.aDescription = pDescription;  
032        this.aExits = new HashMap<String, Room>();
033        this.aTrapDoors = new HashMap<String, Room>();
034        this.aRoomListItems = new ItemList();
035        this.aImageName = pImageName;
036        this.aRoomName = pRoomName;
037    }
038    
039    /**
040     * Gives the description of the room and possible exits.
041     * @return The description of the room and exits.
042     */
043    public String getDescription(){
044        return this.aDescription;
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * Gives a long description of this room
049     * @return Description of the room with exits
050     */
051    public String getLongDescription(){
052        String vDescription = "You are " + this.aDescription + ".\n" + this.getExitString();
053        vDescription += " " + this.aRoomListItems.showItem();
054        return vDescription;
055        
056    }
057    
058    /**
059     * Gives the name of the room
060     * @return The name of the room
061     */
062    public String getRoomName(){
063        return this.aRoomName;
064    }
065    /**
066     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
067     * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
068     * @return The room in the given direction.
069     */
070    public Room getExit(String pDirection){
071        Room vExit = this.aExits.get(pDirection);
072        if(vExit == null){
073            vExit = this.aTrapDoors.get(pDirection);
074        }
075        return vExit;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Gives a string of all exits of the room.
080     * @return A string of all exits of the room.
081     */
082    public String getExitString(){
083        StringBuilder vReturnString = new StringBuilder(" Exits:");
084        for (String vDirection : this.aExits.keySet() ) {
085            vReturnString.append( " " + vDirection );
086        }
087        for (String vDirection : this.aTrapDoors.keySet() ) {
088            vReturnString.append( " " + vDirection );
089        }
090        return vReturnString.toString();
091    }
092
093    
094    /**
095     * Add an item in the room
096     * @param pName Name of the item
097     * @param pItem Item
098     */
099    public void addItem(final String pName, final Item pItem){
100        this.aRoomListItems.addItem(pName, pItem);
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Get the item in the room
105     * @param pName Name of the item    
106     * @return The item in the room
107     */
108    public Item getItem(final String pName){
109        Item vItem = this.aRoomListItems.getItem(pName);
110        //System.out.println(vItem.getItemName());
111        return vItem;
112    }
113
114
115    /**
116     * Define an exit for the room
117     * @param pDirection Direction of the exit
118     * @param pNeighbor Room in the given direction
119     */
120    public void setExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor){
121        this.aExits.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Define a one-way trap door exit for the room
126     * @param pDirection Direction of the exit
127     * @param pNeighbor Room in the given direction
128     */
129    public void setTrapDoorExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor){
130        this.aTrapDoors.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Remove an item from the room
135     * @param pName Name of the item
136     */
137    public void removeItem(final String pName){
138        this.aRoomListItems.removeItem(pName);
139    }
140
141    /**
142     * Return a string describing the room's image name.
143     * @return The image name of the room.
144     */
145    public String getImageName(){
146       return this.aImageName;
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Get all item names present in this room
151     * @return array of item names
152     */
153    public List<String> getItemNames(){
154        return this.aRoomListItems.getItemNames();
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Whether the room currently has no items
159     * @return true if no items
160     */
161    public boolean hasNoItems(){
162        return this.aRoomListItems.isEmpty();
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Check if a room is an exit from this room
167     * @param pRoom Room to check
168     * @return true if the room is an exit
169     */
170    public boolean isExit(final Room pRoom){
171        return this.aTrapDoors.containsValue(pRoom);
172    }
173}
